name: AETHER CRYSTAL
description:
UPDATE: Game ending is now fixed!

Point 'n' space small world game made for Ludum Dare 38 for the "A small world" theme!
There are six crystals you need to collect by visiting some of the objets in the correct order.

Press SPACE to play!

Logo design by Fatalan LIk

Music by The Mugris and The Agrarians

Game made by Stereo Limounsine ltd.
